title: 168: AFC East perfect pairings, talking to Thomas Dimitroff and Chris Rose
itunes:title: 168: AFC East perfect pairings, talking to Thomas Dimitroff and Chris Rose
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks make their perfect NFL Draft pairings for the first two picks for each team in the AFC East. Bucky Brooks also talks to Atlanta Falcons general manager Thomas Dimitroff about the state of his team. Chris Rose joins the show to fix the Cleveland Browns depth chart and DJ and Bucky take a scouts look at North Carolina quarterback Mitchell Trubisky’s pro day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
